interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Lets Hear It for the Laurie Berkner Band
Review Date: 2014/04/29
Store: Rated:    Unrated    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Movies
Product Description: ["Get ready to jump , dance, and sing along to this collection of catchy music with a message! Packed with songs performed by the wildly popular Laurie Berkner Band, this DVD compilation features some of Laurie's most popular tunes from her regular appearances on Jack's Big Music Show. With hosts Moose and Zee, its never been easier to get in tune with learning."]
Average Rating: 4.6
Product Details: {'MPAA rating': 'Unrated (Not Rated)', 'Package Dimensions': '7.4 x 5.2 x 0.6 inches; 0.01 Ounces', 'Item model number': '894524', 'Media Format': 'Dolby, Full Screen, Subtitled, NTSC', 'Release date': 'September 28, 2010', 'Actors': 'Berkner, Laurie', 'Dubbed': 'English', 'Subtitles': 'English', 'Language': 'Unqualified', 'Studio': 'Nickelodeon'}
Review Text: The 2 year old loves these the most. It really gets them moving. She already sings some of the songs.
Review Title: Love Berkner Band
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Hatfields & McCoys [Blu-ray]
Kevin Costner  (Actor, Producer),     Bill Paxton  (Actor),     Kevin Reynolds  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    NR    Format: Blu-ray
Movies & TV, Featured Categories, Blu-ray, Drama
['Bonded by their oath to the same flag, two confederate soldiers, “Devil” Anse Hatfield (Kevin Costner) and Randall McCoy (Bill Paxton), return home seeking peace after tireless months of battle. Their expectations are quickly shattered when a murder based on misunderstandings and an illicit love affair trigger warfare between former comrades and their clans. This historic feud teeters on the brink of an all out civil war as friends and neighbors join opposing sides in a rivalry that would ultimately shape American History.']

I had already seen most of it on TV. But I missed some, so I decided to order it. I loved it. It was really a sad thing that went on, but I enjoyed the movie.
Loved It !!!!!!!

Cedarmont Kids - Toddler Tunes [DVD]
Children  (Actor),     Gary Musick  (Director)    Rated:    Unrated    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD, Music Videos & Concerts
['English & Spanish Versions!', "Give your kids the gift of song! Jam-packed with best-loved, classic children's songs, this live-action collection offers hours of wholesome, interactive fun. Your children will sing and dance along with these all-time favorites - performed by the famous Cedarmont Kids - over and over again. They'll love Sing-Along-Songs! and so will you!", '25 Back-to-Back Music Videos for Kids!The Wheels on the Bus - The Alphabet Song - Polly, Put the Kettle On - God Made Me - Eensy, Weensy Spider - The More We Get Together - Six Little Ducks - Baa, Baa, Black Sheep - Roll Over - Father, We Thank Thee - Are You Sleeping? - Jack and Jill - Oh Where, Oh Where Has My Little Dog Gone? - Get on Board - Oh Dear! What Can The Matter Be? - Pop! Goes the Weasel! - This Old Man - London Bridge - Mary Had a Little Lamb - The Muffin Man - Row, Row, Row Your Boat - Deep and Wide - Mulberry Bush - Old MacDonald - Be Kind to Your Web-footed Friends', 'DVD Bonus Features: English or Spanish language options available, in stereo, with subtitled sing-along lyrics! Split track audio lets you sing along with Cedarmont Kids or by yourself with the music Plus, cast and production notes - 30 minutes']

The kids loves the songs and they run, play,dance and jump around to the music and singing. They have lots of fun.
Grandkids

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary**

- **Interests**: The user continues to have a strong interest in historical dramas and is deeply dedicated to family-friendly content, particularly music and activities that engage their grandchildren. This is further emphasized by their investment in children's entertainment that promotes joy and movement.

- **Media Format Preference**: The user appreciates high-quality formats for adult content but remains flexible with media formats for children’s programming, choosing DVD formats to ensure fun and interactive experiences.

- **Engagement with Content**: The user cherishes shared moments with their grandchildren, often selecting music content that encourages active participation, such as singing and dancing. This approach reinforces their desire to create memorable family experiences.

- **Emotional Response**: They maintain a strong emotional connection through engaging narratives and joyful experiences. Their enthusiasm for children’s music showcases their nurturing personality and a commitment to fostering creativity and happiness in their grandchildren’s lives.

- **Rating Behavior**: The user consistently rates content positively, reflecting their appreciation for works that resonate with them and their family. Their openness to exploring various entertainment genres, from historical narratives to lively children's music, highlights their passion for meaningful storytelling and enjoyment.

Overall, this profile illustrates a film enthusiast who values quality, emotional engagement, and shared experiences, prioritizing family connections through both historical and children’s entertainment.
